title: Shaco and Tahm Glitch

embed.description: If Tahm eats Shaco's clone, then spits out the clone, it will be invisible. This is no mod or hack, just a glitch that me and my friend found.

body: So the other day, me and my friend were playing some league, I was Shaco and he was Tahm, when it came to a team fight, I used my ult, then my friend ate my clone then he spat it out, I realized my R is not on cool down yet, so I targeted a minion and killed it. We tested this is a custom game and recorded it. Sorry for the bad quality.

replies.body:
Teehee.
You could say that even a clone of Shaco, was Tahm much for him to handle.
I'm sorry. That really is a weird bug. LIKE KHA_ZIX!
Sorry. I Brand this a Kat-astrophe.
Nope, I'm done.
